title: Roasted cod, peas, broad beans, Morteau sausage and chanterelles
description: Fillets of cod served with the best of spring's vegetables sautéed with smoked French sausages.
ingredients: 1 punnet living pea shoots, leaves picked
250g/9oz chanterelle mushrooms, stems trimmed, washed and dried
1 bunch fresh marjoram, leaves picked and finely chopped
